snippet: Walmart is selling its Chinese online business, Yihaodian, to China’s No. 2 e-commerce site, JD.com, in an effort to bolster its presence there.
abstract: Walmart is selling its Chinese online business Yihaodian to JD.com, China's second-biggest e-commerce site; company is hoping partnership will increase its presence in country.
lead_paragraph: Walmart is selling its Chinese online business, Yihaodian, to China’s No. 2 e-commerce site, JD.com, in an effort to bolster its presence there.

headline.main: Walmart Sells E-Commerce Site in China, Forging Strategic Alliance
headline.print_headline: To Gain Ally, Walmart Sells Site in China
